careers.name: Engineering (Various Specializations)
careers.pathway: JEE Main -> JEE Advanced -> B.Tech/B.E. (4 years) -> M.Tech (optional)
careers.risks: High competition, requires strong foundation in PCM subjects

careers.name: Architecture
careers.risks: Requires artistic aptitude along with technical skills

careers.name: Data Science / Analytics
careers.pathway: JEE Main -> B.Tech Computer Science/IT -> Specialization in Data Science -> M.Tech/M.Sc (optional)
careers.risks: Rapidly evolving field, requires continuous learning

careers.name: Medical Doctor (MBBS)
careers.pathway: NEET -> MBBS (5.5 years) -> MD/MS (3 years, optional)
careers.risks: Extremely high competition, long duration, high cost

careers.name: Pharmacy
careers.pathway: NEET/State Pharmacy Entrance -> B.Pharm (4 years) -> M.Pharm (optional)

careers.name: Biotechnology / Life Sciences
careers.pathway: NEET/JEE Main -> B.Sc Biotechnology -> M.Sc -> Ph.D (optional)
careers.risks: Research-oriented field, may require higher education for better opportunities

careers.name: Chartered Accountancy (CA)
careers.pathway: 12th Commerce -> CA Foundation -> CA Intermediate -> CA Final
careers.risks: Rigorous examination process, requires dedication and time

careers.name: Business Administration / Management
careers.pathway: 12th Commerce -> B.Com/BBA (3 years) -> MBA (2 years, optional)
careers.risks: MBA requires competitive entrance exams (CAT, XAT, etc.)

careers.name: Finance & Banking
careers.pathway: 12th Commerce -> B.Com (Finance) -> M.Com/MBA Finance -> Professional certifications
careers.risks: Banking jobs require competitive exams, finance roles need strong analytical skills

careers.name: Psychology / Counseling
careers.pathway: 12th Arts -> B.A Psychology (3 years) -> M.A Psychology -> M.Phil/Ph.D (optional)
careers.risks: Requires higher education for professional practice, licensing required

careers.name: Law
careers.pathway: 12th Arts -> CLAT -> B.A LL.B (5 years) or LL.B (3 years after graduation) -> LL.M (optional)
careers.risks: Highly competitive entrance exams, requires strong English and reasoning

careers.name: Journalism & Mass Communication
careers.pathway: 12th Arts -> B.A Journalism/Mass Communication (3 years) -> M.A (optional)
careers.risks: Field is evolving with digital media, requires adaptability

careers.name: Skill-based Certifications & Entrepreneurship
careers.pathway: 12th Vocational -> Skill Development Programs -> Certifications -> Entrepreneurship/Employment
careers.risks: Requires identifying market demand, may need additional business skills

careers.name: Technical Trades & Apprenticeships
careers.risks: Physical work involved, requires continuous skill upgradation

careers.name: Hospitality & Tourism
careers.pathway: 12th Vocational -> Diploma in Hospitality/Tourism -> BHM (optional) -> Industry experience
entrance_exams: Direct admission or entrance exams for BHM
careers.risks: Service industry, requires good interpersonal skills and flexibility

general.text_en: What are your favourite subjects? (Please list 2-3 subjects)
general.text_mr: तुमचे आवडते विषय कोणते? (कृपया 2-3 विषय सूचीबद्ध करा)

general.text_en: Which subjects do you find challenging or weak?
general.text_mr: कोणते विषय तुम्हाला आव्हानात्मक किंवा कमकुवत वाटतात?

general.text_en: What is your expected marks range? (e.g., 80-90%, 70-80%, etc.)
What are your interests and hobbies? (e.g., reading, sports, music, technology, etc.)
general.text_mr: तुमचे आवडी आणि छंद काय आहेत? (उदा., वाचन, खेळ, संगीत, तंत्रज्ञान, इ.)

PCM.text_en: How comfortable are you with advanced mathematics and problem-solving?
PCM.text_mr: प्रगत गणित आणि समस्या सोडवण्यासाठी तुम्ही किती सोयीस्कर आहात?

PCM.text_en: Are you interested in engineering, technology, or innovation?
PCM.text_mr: तुम्हाला अभियांत्रिकी, तंत्रज्ञान किंवा नवकल्पनेमध्ये रस आहे का?

PCB.text_en: How interested are you in biology, healthcare, or life sciences?
PCB.text_mr: जीवशास्त्र, आरोग्यसेवा किंवा जीवन विज्ञानामध्ये तुम्हाला किती रस आहे?

PCB.text_en: Are you interested in pursuing a career in medicine or healthcare?
PCB.text_mr: तुम्हाला वैद्यकीय किंवा आरोग्यसेवा क्षेत्रात करिअर करण्यात रस आहे का?

Commerce.text_en: Are you interested in business, finance, or entrepreneurship?
Commerce.text_mr: तुम्हाला व्यवसाय, वित्त किंवा उद्योजकतेमध्ये रस आहे का?

Commerce.text_en: How comfortable are you with numbers, accounting, and financial calculations?
Commerce.text_mr: संख्या, लेखा आणि आर्थिक गणनांसाठी तुम्ही किती सोयीस्कर आहात?

Arts.text_en: How would you rate your creativity and interest in humanities subjects?
Arts.text_mr: तुम्ही तुमची सर्जनशीलता आणि मानवतावादी विषयांमध्ये रस कसा मोजाल?

Arts.text_en: How strong are your communication and writing skills?
Arts.text_mr: तुमची संप्रेषण आणि लेखन कौशल्ये किती मजबूत आहेत?

Vocational.text_en: What practical skills or trades interest you?
Vocational.text_mr: कोणती व्यावहारिक कौशल्ये किंवा व्यापार तुम्हाला आकर्षित करतात?

Vocational.text_en: Are you interested in skill-based certifications and hands-on work?
Vocational.text_mr: तुम्हाला कौशल्य-आधारित प्रमाणपत्रे आणि हाताने काम करण्यात रस आहे का?
